content:
碧蓝航线 Azurlane Laffey
本森级驱逐舰拉菲听候您的吩咐……指挥官，这个耳朵不是真的，请不要再盯着看了…
Benson-class destroyer, Laffey, waiting for your orders......Commander, the ears are not real, so please stop staring at them......

终于出了初始三只选的小兔纸～我的主力！改造后已经lv107了！输出超级给力的！来和我一起干了这瓶82年的拉菲！
又尝试了loli角色，外套好暖呀<3
Laffey is the character I choose when first time log in to the AzurLane game. Till now she is still one of my fav ship girls.
Her costume jacket is so warm btw.

Photography: Zy Changshin Zhang

#azurlane #cosplay
